name: get_news_articles
description: Search for articles related to spaceflight

event.description: Search for all documents related to a specific event using its Launch Library 2 ID.

has_event.description: Get all documents that have a related event.

has_launch.description: Get all documents that have a related launch.

launch.description: Search for all documents related to a specific launch using its Launch Library 2 ID.

limit.description: Number of results to return per page.

news_site.description: Search for documents with a news_site__name present in a list of comma-separated values. Case insensitive.

offset.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

ordering.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

published_at_gt.description: Get all documents published after a given ISO8601 timestamp (excluded).

published_at_gte.description: Get all documents published after a given ISO8601 timestamp (included).

published_at_lt.description: Get all documents published before a given ISO8601 timestamp (excluded).

published_at_lte.description: Get all documents published before a given ISO8601 timestamp (included).

search.description: Search for documents with a specific phrase in the title or summary.

summary_contains.description: Search for all documents with a specific phrase in the summary.

summary_contains_all.description: Search for documents with a summary containing all keywords from comma-separated values.

summary_contains_one.description: Search for documents with a summary containing at least one keyword from comma-separated values.

title_contains.description: Search for all documents with a specific phrase in the title.

title_contains_all.description: Search for documents with a title containing all keywords from comma-separated values.

title_contains_one.description: Search for documents with a title containing at least one keyword from comma-separated values.

updated_at_gt.description: Get all documents updated after a given ISO8601 timestamp (excluded).

updated_at_gte.description: Get all documents updated after a given ISO8601 timestamp (included).

updated_at_lt.description: Get all documents updated before a given ISO8601 timestamp (excluded).

updated_at_lte.description: Get all documents updated before a given ISO8601 timestamp (included).

name: get_news_articles_by_id
description: Search for an article related to spaceflight

id.description: A unique integer value identifying this article.
